fields.errorMessage: You must check the box to sign the declaration

choices.label: I agree, and declare that all the details entered are correct and complete to the best of my knowledge and belief.

acknowledgementSection.title: Your registration has been submitted Genesis

header.en: Make sure the information you have given is correct.
header.cy: Gwnewch yn siŵr bod yr wybodaeth a roddwyd gennych yn gywir.

footer.en:
##Now send your form

You need to submit your form on the next screen.

Before you do this you can [print or save a PDF copy of your answers (opens in a new window or tab)](${link.printSummaryPdf}).
footer.cy:
##Nawr anfonwch eich ffurflen

Mae angen i chi gyflwyno’ch ffurflen ar y sgrin nesaf.

Cyn i chi wneud hyn gallwch [argraffu neu gadw copi PDF o’ch atebion (yn agor ffenestr neu dab newydd)](${link.printSummaryPdf}).
